vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.11;
son of: Eliphaz (H0464);
brother of: Teman (H8487), Zepho (H6825), Gatam (H1609), Kenaz (H7073), Amalek (H6002H) and Korah (H7141H)
§ Omar = "speaker" or "eloquent"
grandson of Esau
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elifaz, hijo de Esaú
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
阿抹 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "講演者" 或 "雄辯有口才的"
以掃的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
阿抹 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "讲演者" 或 "雄辩有口才的"
以扫的孙子
